homeDescription: A modern Vue.js application with multilingual support and mobile capabilities.
feature1Description: Built with Vue 3, the latest and most powerful version of Vue.js framework.
feature2Description: Powered by Capacitor for seamless iOS and Android deployment.
feature3Description: Full internationalization support with easy language switching.
aboutDescription: Learn more about our mission, vision, and values.
missionDescription: To create innovative digital solutions that connect people and empower communities worldwide.
visionDescription: A world where technology bridges gaps and creates opportunities for everyone.
contactDescription: Get in touch with our team for partnerships, support, or general inquiries.

zikr.appDescription: Your digital companion for Islamic remembrance and spiritual practice
zikr.feature1Description: Access authentic Islamic zikrs with Arabic text and transliteration
zikr.feature2Description: Count your repetitions with ease using our digital counter
zikr.feature3Description: Track your daily progress and view historical data
zikr.feature4Description: Available in multiple languages with detailed descriptions
zikr.screenshot1Caption: Browse and select from traditional zikrs
zikr.finalCtaDescription: Start practicing zikr today and strengthen your connection with Allah
zikr.completionDescription: You have completed this zikr. May Allah accept your remembrance.
zikr.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the counter?
zikr.confirmExit: You have unsaved progress. Do you want to save before exiting?
zikr.instructions: Tap the circle, click anywhere, or press spacebar to count
zikr.noDataForDate: No zikr data found for this date
zikr.noDataForMonth: No zikr data found for this month

admin.loginDescription: Access the admin panel to manage zikrs and translations
admin.confirmDeleteZikr: Are you sure you want to delete this zikr?
